sourcesContent:
About Us

Our Mission

We are committed to creating fully accessible web experiences that everyone can use, regardless of their abilities.

Our Team

Deepak Avvari

Senior Software Engineer

Abhipsa Mohapatra

Software Engineer

Contact Us

Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you soon!
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; interface ContactForm { name: string; email: string; message: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { contactForm: ContactForm = { name: '', email: '', message: '' }; submitting = false; submitSuccess = false; onSubmit(): void { if (!this.contactForm.name || !this.contactForm.email || !this.contactForm.message) { // Announce validation error to screen readers const announcement = document.createElement('div'); announcement.setAttribute('aria-live', 'assertive'); announcement.textContent = 'Please fill in all required fields'; document.body.appendChild(announcement); setTimeout(() => document.body.removeChild(announcement), 1000); return; } this.submitting = true; // Simulate form submission setTimeout(() => { this.submitting = false; this.submitSuccess = true; this.contactForm = { name: '', email: '', message: '' }; // Reset success message after 5 seconds setTimeout(() => { this.submitSuccess = false; }, 5000); }, 1500); } }
